challenges.title: Build Your First Chatbot
challenges.description: Create a simple chatbot using OpenAI API that can answer questions about a specific topic

challenges.title: Prompt Engineering Master
challenges.description: Design 5 different prompts for various tasks using advanced techniques like few-shot learning

challenges.title: Document Q&A System
challenges.description: Build a RAG system that can answer questions from uploaded PDF documents

challenges.title: Custom AI Agent
challenges.description: Create an autonomous agent that can research topics and provide comprehensive summaries

challenges.title: Semantic Search Engine
challenges.description: Build a semantic search engine using embeddings and hybrid search techniques

challenges.title: Fine-tune Your Own Model
challenges.description: Fine-tune a small language model on a custom dataset using LoRA

challenges.title: Production RAG System
challenges.description: Deploy a production-ready RAG application with caching, monitoring, and optimization

challenges.title: Multi-Agent System
challenges.description: Build a collaborative multi-agent system where agents work together to solve complex tasks
